name: sea surface height
dataset_description: Fields include dynamic sea surface height [SSH], sea surface height above the geoid [SSHNOIBC], model sea level [ETAN], and the inverse barometer (IB) correction to sea level from atmosphere pressure. Both SSH and SSHNOIBC account for global mean steric sea level changes due to density changes in the Boussinesq volume-conserving model (Greatbatch correction) and the IB correction from sea-ice pressure loading.

name: ocean bottom pressure
dataset_description: Fields include ocean bottom pressure with and without the contribution from atmosphere pressure [OBPGMAP, OBP], anomalies of OBP and OBPGMAP with respect to their 2005-2010 means [OBPAnoma, OBPGMAPA], and model hydrostatic bottom pressure anomaly [PHIBOT]. Ocean bottom pressure fields are provided in terms of equivalent water height.

name: ocean and sea-ice surface freshwater fluxes
fields: EXFpreci, EXFevap, EXFroff, SIsnPrcp, EXFempmr, oceFWflx, SIatmFW, SFLUX, SIacSubl, SIrsSubl, SIfwThru

name: ocean and sea-ice surface heat fluxes
fields: EXFhl, EXFhs, EXFlwdn, EXFswdn, EXFqnet, oceQnet, SIatmQnt, TFLUX, EXFswnet, EXFlwnet, oceQsw, SIaaflux

name: atmosphere surface temperature, humidity, wind, and pressure
fields: EXFatemp, EXFaqh, EXFuwind, EXFvwind, EXFwspee, EXFpress

name: sea-ice and snow concentration and thickness
sea-ice and snow horizontal volume fluxes
ocean three-dimensional volume fluxes
comment: Volume flux in +x direction = UVELMASS drF dyG. Volume flux in +y direction = VVELMASS drF dxG. Volume flux in +z direction = WVELMASS drA.

name: ocean three-dimensional potential temperature fluxes
fields: ADVx_TH, DFxE_TH, ADVy_TH, DFyE_TH, ADVr_TH, DFrE_TH, DFrI_TH
comment: ADV*_TH and DF*_TH terms are potential temperature fluxes.

name: ocean three-dimensional salinity fluxes
fields: ADVx_SLT, DFxE_SLT, ADVy_SLT, DFyE_SLT, ADVr_SLT, DFrE_SLT, DFrI_SLT, oceSPtnd
comment: ADV*_SLT and DF*_SLT terms are salinity fluxes. oceSPtnd is salt tendency per unit area (g m-2 s-1), not salinity flux.

name: sea-ice salt plume fluxes
comment: oceSPflx is salt mass flux per unit area (g m-2 s-1), not salinity flux.

name: ocean density, stratification, and hydrostatic pressure
dataset_description: ocean density, stratification, and hydrostatic pressure

name: ocean three-dimensional momentum tendencies in the model x-direction
fields: TOTUTEND, Um_Cori, Um_Advec, Um_Diss, Um_Ext, Um_dPhiX, AB_gU, Um_ImplD

name: ocean three-dimensional advective momentum tendencies in the model x-direction
ocean three-dimensional dissipative momentum tendencies in the model x-direction
ocean three-dimensional momentum tendencies in the model y-direction
fields: TOTVTEND, Vm_Cori, Vm_Advec, Vm_Diss, Vm_Ext, Vm_dPhiY, AB_gV, Vm_ImplD

name: ocean three-dimensional advective momentum tendencies in the model y-direction
ocean three-dimensional dissipative momentum tendencies in the model y-direction
sea-ice thermodynamic budget
fields: SIFao, SIFionet, SIFianet, SIFmi, SIFFlood, SIsnAccR, SIsnmltS, SIgamma
